name: Humstar — GameCraft 2017
description:
Welcome to Humstar, an online multiplayer game developed by Jorge Barata at Gamecraft 2017.

You can play here: humstar2017.herokuapp.com.

Move with the arrow keys or swipe in the direction you want to go. Get all the starfuel you can. Add or kick bots sending /addbot or /kickbot.

Source Code: https://github.com/jorgebg/gamecraft-2017
